name: Fish Fish Revolution
description:
Game used for prototyping and Fun. It's a fishing game with 18 fish that you can catch, and 2-rod upgrades. Have fun! Make sure to play with sound on :D

How to play:

  1. Select an area to fish using your mouse. You can go back to other areas by pressing the "Back" sign.
  2. Use A and D to move left and right.
  3. Press Space Bar to fill your meter, and press again to throw the hook.
  4. If you throw close to a fish they will engage with the hook, and a circle will appear. Press Space at the right time to hook the fish! 
  5. Once the fish is hooked, use the Arrow Keys to play the mini-game and catch the fish!
  6. When you catch a fish you earn gold. You can spend gold to get a fishing rod upgrade, just go back to the map and press the power up button. You need the rod upgrades to reach bigger and harder fish!
  7. Try to catch all 18 fish 😊
